title: Danmuji Muchim (Seasoned Yellow Pickled Radish) | 단무지 무침
ingredients: 265g danmuji (Korean yellow pickled radish, store bought)*
directions: Rinse 265g of danmuji under water. Then cut 265g danmuji into 0.5 cm halves and add to a medium bowl.

Add remaining ingredients to the same bowl and mix: 3 Tbsp green onions (finely chopped), 1/2 Tbsp garlic (minced), 1/2 Tbsp Korean Red Pepper Flakes, 1 & 1/2 tsp sesame oil, and 1/2 Tbsp sesame seeds (roasted)
Store in airtight container and refrigerate. Serve immediately.
